name: Word of Radiance
description: Burning radiance erupts from you in a 5-foot Emanation. Each creature of your choice that you can see in it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 Radiant damage.
higherLevelsDescription: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

effects.special: Affects each creature of your choice that you can see within the area.

engineHook.notes: Requires area of effect targeting with a save-for-damage mechanic.
